snippet: Billy Hardwick, a two-time Professional Bowlers Association player of the year and an 18-time winner in his Hall of Fame career, died on Saturday.
abstract: Billy Hardwick, two-time Professional Bowlers Assn player of the year and an 18-time winner in his Hall of Fame career, dies at age 72.
lead_paragraph: Billy Hardwick, a two-time Professional Bowlers Association player of the year and an 18-time winner in his Hall of Fame career, died on Saturday.

headline.main: Bowling Hall of Famer Billy Hardwick Dies
